means: [女子名] 阿米蒂来源于拉丁语，含义是“友好的”(friendly)

sentence.Network_en: He wished to live in amity with his neighbour.
sentence.Network_cn: 他希望与邻居和睦相处。

sentence.Network_en: We live in amity with our neighbours.
He lives in amity with his neighbours.
sentence.Network_cn: 他和他的邻居相处得很和睦.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... （amat+ory→ 爱的 ） amity 友好，和睦 enmity 敌意，仇恨.
和字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 和美〖 harmoniousandhappy〗 和睦〖 harmony;concord;amity〗 和暖〖 pleasantlywarm〗.
学词根记单词_英语杂谈_天涯论坛 ... amiable adj. 亲切的, 和蔼可亲的 amity n. 友好, 亲善关系 enmity n. 敌意, 憎恨.
【最新】GRE单词(红宝书)TXT完全版 - 豆丁网 ... amicable a. 友好的 amity n. (人或国之间的)友好关系 amnesia n. 健忘症.

list.abs: This system interface amity operation simple more practical., 本系统界面友好操纵简朴比较实用.
we impulsed amity development of two nation ' s connection by great effort !, 我们正努力推动两国关系的友好发展.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English : from Old French amitie, based on Latin amicus 'friend'

entry.def: Amity is peaceful, friendly relations between people or countries.

example.ex: He wished to live in amity with his neighbour.
example.tran: 他希望与邻居和睦相处。

means.word_mean: 2. a state of friendship and cordiality

stems_affixes.word_buile: ami=am爱,情爱+able能……的→能[被]爱的→亲切的
am爱,情爱+ic+able能……的→能爱[你]的→友好的
am爱,情爱+ity表名词,状态,性质→爱的状态→和睦
am爱,情爱+our表名词→n.奸情, 恋情
en进入+am爱,情爱+ity表名词→enmity爱太多的成为恨

sentences.en: We live in amity with our neighbours.
